ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Adds support for the English language to the 'koRpus' package. To ask for help, report bugs, suggest feature improvements, or discuss the global development of the package, please consider subscribing to the koRpus-dev mailing list (<http://korpusml.reaktanz.de>).

Adds support for the English language to the 'koRpus' package. To ask for help, report bugs, suggest feature improvements, or discuss the global development of the package, please consider subscribing to the koRpus-dev mailing list (<http://korpusml.reaktanz.de>).

name: r-korpus.lang.en
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.1-4" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-korpus.lang.en
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/koRpus.lang.en_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/koRpus.lang.en/koRpus.lang.en_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 629cfc278a2d9aa28cb31323bc5f0077322273aefff8532232ea48c98b0152b9

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-korpus >=0.11_2
    - r-sylly.en
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-korpus >=0.11_2
    - r-sylly.en

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('koRpus.lang.en')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('koRpus.lang.en')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://reaktanz.de/?c=hacking&s=koRpus
  license: GPL (>= 3)
  summary: Adds support for the English language to the 'koRpus' package. To ask for help, report bugs, suggest feature improvements, or discuss the global development of the package, please consider subscribing to the koRpus-dev mailing list (<http://korpusml.reaktanz.de>).
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - philip-khor

# Package: koRpus.lang.en
# Type: Package
# Title: Language Support for 'koRpus' Package: English
# Depends: R (>= 3.1),koRpus (>= 0.11-2)
# Imports: methods,sylly.en
# Description: Adds support for the English language to the 'koRpus' package. To ask for help, report bugs, suggest feature improvements, or discuss the global development of the package, please consider subscribing to the koRpus-dev mailing list (<http://korpusml.reaktanz.de>).
# License: GPL (>= 3)
# Encoding: UTF-8
# LazyLoad: yes
# URL: https://reaktanz.de/?c=hacking&s=koRpus
